title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 363.1 - Objective
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 363.1 - Objective

State Regulations

To provide the Conditional Release Commission with accurate
and reliable information to determine the appropriateness of the conditional
release decision and any special conditions for the release supervision
period. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
363.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
